details.body:
The Manufacturing Advisory Service (MAS) is funded by the Department for Business, Innovation and Skills and provides support for manufacturing businesses based in England to help them improve and grow.

Regardless of company size, MAS’s team of highly skilled advisers can help manufacturers streamline their processes, reduce waste, become more energy efficient and improve and grow their business. All advisers have ‘hands-on’ experience of both shop floor working and management skills and work with manufacturers to ensure that their business is run in the best way possible.

For SMEs in England, many of their services are free and supplemented by appropriate grant funding.
details.eligibility:
Any manufacturing business based in England can access support. If you are a small to medium enterprise, you may be eligible for financial assistance with improvement projects.

Manufacturing firms based in England and employing fewer than 250 people are the target group for this scheme. Services to larger businesses will be provided at full market rate.
